member.name: T:Books.Inventory
member.summary: Inventory is a singleton class. It maintains a list of Books, each referenced by a unique ID.
member.remarks: Use the static property Instance to obtain a reference to the singleton. Then use the [] syntax using the Book ID as the index to access individual Books.

member.name: F:Books.Inventory.mInstance
member.summary: Private member field containing a reference to the singleton instance.

member.name: F:Books.Inventory.mLibraryBooks
member.summary: Hashtable containing a collection of Book objects.

member.name: P:Books.Inventory.Instance
member.summary: Instance is a static read-only property, which should be used to obtain a reference to the Inventory.
